metadata.title: CVE-2018-18345 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect handling of blob URLS in Site Isolation in Google Chrome prior to71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to bypass site isolation protections via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
